channel.title: Hydrophobic Effect on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hydrophobic Effect on RD's Blog

item.title: Water-Membrane Partition Thermodynamics of an Amphiphilic Lipopeptide: An Enthalpy-Driven Hydrophobic Effect
item.description: Notes on 2008 Biophysical Journal paper analyzing the thermodynamics of membrane insertion for an H-ras lipopeptide anchor (ANCH), highlighting the role of enthalpy-driven hydrophobic effects and conformational selection.
